apps.name: YouTubeRebornPlus
apps.subtitle: The best tweak for the YouTube app.

versions.localizedDescription: Added Version Spoofer, fixed 2 broken options (Share & Add To Buttons), Bug fixes.

apps.localizedDescription:
YouTube Reborn is the best tweak when it comes to customization towards the YouTube app.

This version of YouTube Reborn is v4.1.1

permissions.usageDescription: Allows you to use your photo library to set your profile image.
